main.description:
Go on an epicurean journey to Italy while basking in the sun-kissed glow of Boracay at Forno Osteria, Discovery Boracay. Excite your appetite with plates of pasta and brick-oven pizzas lovingly made from scratch. The chef's prized Josper Oven gives a distinctive smokey flavor to fork-tender steaks and fresh seafood, best paired with the Italian restaurant’s exquisite wine selection and eclectic cocktail menu that are rare to find on the island.

The homemade goodness of Forno Osteria's culinary creations is as delicious as it is evocative — not to be missed when in Discovery Boracay.
Enjoy the best rates + special privileges await when you book directly on our website!

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
Up to 20% OFF on Best Available Rates

 

Inclusions:

  • Breakfast for two (2) persons in a Junior and One-Bedroom Suite, four (4) persons in a Two-Bedroom Suite, and six (6) in a Three-Bedroom Suite.
  • High-speed internet access
  • Access to swimming pool and gym
  • 15% discount on Food and Beverage, redeemable at 22 Prime, Restaurant 5, and room service.
  • Complimentary late check-out at 4:00PM for Junior and One-Bedroom Suites only (subject to availability)

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
Enjoy up to 20% savings on the Best Available Rate when you book directly with us!

 

Inclusions:

  • Breakfast for two (2) at Restaurant Tapenade (applicable to Business Flat and Business Suite bookings)
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access for unlimited devices
  • Access to infinity pool and 24-hour gym
  • Restaurant dining credits worth PHP 1,000 nett per stay, redeemable at our signature restaurants, including Tapenade and Flame.
  • Complimentary single-car parking.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description:
Stay for a minimum of 2 nights and enjoy 25% off on room rates when you book directly with us!

 

Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast at Sands Restaurant
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Caticlan Airport
  • Complimentary gourmet pizza at Forno Osteria per stay
  • 20% discount in Indigo Restaurant and Forno Osteria
  • 15% discount at Bogart’s Bar
  • 15% discount on Terra Spa services
  • 10% discount on Room Service
  • Welcome drink upon arrival
  • Complimentary glass of cocktail per person per night

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Enjoy up to 25% off on room rates for a minimum stay of 2 nights when you book directly with us!

 

Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast at Firefish Restaurant
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Busuanga airport for two (2)
  • Complimentary Taranuman Pizza
  • PHP 600 food voucher
  • 10% discount on drinks
  • 20% discount Glow Spa services

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Enjoy up to 25% Savings on our Best Available Rates when you book your next getaway today!

 

Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast for two (2) persons at The Shoreline
  • Complimentary roundtrip airport and boat transfers for 2 persons
  • Complimentary use of swimming pool and beach area
  • Complimentary WiFi access
  • 10% off on food and beverage outlets
  • 10% off on watersports activities
  • 10% off on Samal Escape Spa treatments
  • Welcome drink upon arrival

venues.title: Minami Resort
venues.description:
Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast for two adults at Lingaw Restaurant
  • Food and beverage credit with PHP 1,500 per day
  • Wireless Internet Access
  • Use of snorkeling gear and aqua shoes
  • Pool and beach access
  • Complimentary spelunking trip  in our in-property cave for two (2)
  • Refreshments at the poolside daily
  • In-room Linong Head, Neck, and Shoulder Massage

 

Validity

Booking Period: January 4 – April 30, 2024

Stay Period: Until April 30, 2024

Go on an epicurean journey to Italy while basking in the sun-kissed glow of Boracay at Forno Osteria, Discovery Boracay. Excite your appetite with plates of pasta and brick-oven pizzas lovingly made from scratch. The chef's prized Josper Oven gives a distinctive smokey flavor to fork-tender steaks and fresh seafood, best paired with the Italian restaurant’s exquisite wine selection and eclectic cocktail menu that are rare to find on the island.

The homemade goodness of Forno Osteria's culinary creations is as delicious as it is evocative — not to be missed when in Discovery Boracay.

main.description: Located on the 16th floor, FLAME is Discovery Primea’s Modern European restaurant. The menu combines modern European cuisine with Asian flavors and contemporary culinary techniques, creating dishes that tantalize every taste and texture. Enjoy an exciting new repertoire of exquisite dishes created by Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco.

main.description:
Perfectly cooked, the best steaks in Manila take center stage at 22 Prime amid a stunning view of the skyline of the Ortigas Business District. Located on the 22nd floor, the award-winning restaurant is Discovery Suites’ flagship dining restaurant and is widely recognized as the country’s foremost name in US Prime Angus steaks—named one of the Best Restaurants by Tatler Philippines for years and counting.

Indulge in refined dining options with Executive Chef Gerwin Bailon’s culinary creations: a selection of premium cuts with impeccable wine pairings. In this meat lover’s mecca, the dining experience receives a distinctive and unforgettable flair.

schedules.title: Operating Hours
schedules.time:
Monday to Sunday

 12NN to 2PM (by reservation); 5PM to 10PM (available for reservation and walk-ins)
 
Advanced reservation at least one (1) day prior to arrival is encouraged.

main.description:
Showcasing the bold, light, and summery flavors of the Mediterranean is Restaurant Tapenade—a Discovery Primea signature dining destination. 

Apart from its well-known authentic paella flavors, another distinctive highlight of the restaurant is the Tapenade Salad Room, which offers one of the most luxurious salad experiences in the Philippines. 
Relish an abundant smorgasbord of newly-harvested greens, exquisite salad sauces, freshly-shucked oysters, and premium cold cuts and cheese stations. 

Indulge in Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco’s bestseller, the Porcini-Crusted US Angus Rib-Eye.

schedules.title: Operating Hours
schedules.time:
Monday to Sunday

 6AM to 10PM

Advanced reservations are recommended
